body:
Hi @droidpl,

We have applied on your name from the Github protector
webhook the following changes on the master branch in this
repository:

- Require pull requests for merging
- Dismiss stale pull request approvals when new commits are pushed
- Require review from Code Owners
- Restrict who can dismiss pull request reviews (Only droidpl can)
- Require status checks to pass before merging
- Include administrators
- Restrict who can push to matching branches (Only droidpl can)

This is what Github responded to the change:
```javascript
 {
  "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection",
  "required_status_checks": {
    "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/required_status_checks",
    "strict": true,
    "contexts": [
      "continuous-integration/jenkins"
    ],
    "contexts_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/required_status_checks/contexts"
  },
  "restrictions": {
    "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/restrictions",
    "users_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/restrictions/users",
    "teams_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/restrictions/teams",
    "users": [
      {
        "login": "droidpl",
        "id": 2143931,
        "node_id": "MDQ6VXNlcjIxNDM5MzE=",
        "avatar_url": "https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/2143931?v=4",
        "gravatar_id": "",
        "url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl",
        "html_url": "https://github.com/droidpl",
        "followers_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/followers",
        "following_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/following{/other_user}",
        "gists_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/gists{/gist_id}",
        "starred_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/starred{/owner}{/repo}",
        "subscriptions_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/subscriptions",
        "organizations_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/orgs",
        "repos_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/repos",
        "events_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/events{/privacy}",
        "received_events_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/received_events",
        "type": "User",
        "site_admin": false
      }
    ],
    "teams": []
  },
  "required_pull_request_reviews": {
    "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/required_pull_request_reviews",
    "dismiss_stale_reviews": true,
    "require_code_owner_reviews": true,
    "dismissal_restrictions": {
      "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/dismissal_restrictions",
      "users_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/dismissal_restrictions/users",
      "teams_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/dismissal_restrictions/teams",
      "users": [
        {
          "login": "droidpl",
          "id": 2143931,
          "node_id": "MDQ6VXNlcjIxNDM5MzE=",
          "avatar_url": "https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/2143931?v=4",
          "gravatar_id": "",
          "url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl",
          "html_url": "https://github.com/droidpl",
          "followers_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/followers",
          "following_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/following{/other_user}",
          "gists_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/gists{/gist_id}",
          "starred_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/starred{/owner}{/repo}",
          "subscriptions_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/subscriptions",
          "organizations_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/orgs",
          "repos_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/repos",
          "events_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/events{/privacy}",
          "received_events_url": "https://api.github.com/users/droidpl/received_events",
          "type": "User",
          "site_admin": false
        }
      ],
      "teams": []
    }
  },
  "enforce_admins": {
    "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/shield-org/Sample/branches/master/protection/enforce_admins",
    "enabled": true
  }
} 
```
Cheers.
title: Protections enabled on master
